about_the_game:
In Girls of The Tower: Journey To Chaos",players can choose a character to embark on the adventure of chaos. In battles, players can use original monsters as minions to fight, and equipped items will gain more powerful abilities through enchantment. In towns, players can access the Chaos Shop through the central obelisk to obtain new magic cards and enchanted equipment, and even use the Subjugation Contract to enslave bosses and add them to their lineup.

Brand New Challenges!
The Path of Chaos brings forth brand new challenges. At the journey's end, you will uncover the twisted truth of this chaos and witness Jeffrey's new form, warped by chaos!

More Minions and New Bonds
In the Path of Chaos, players can select original monsters as minions, and even acquire monster bosses in the Chaos Shop! Experience the new bonds of monster minions awaiting you!

Harness the Power of Enchantment
The Path of Chaos is filled with enchanted artifacts. Utilize the power of enchantment to strengthen your equipment and magic cards!

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains sensitive contents such as partial nudity or sexual content, as well as alcohol use, may not be suitable for all age ranges.
